description: This file defines the root Angular component for the frontend application, setting up component dependencies, initializing theme settings, and exposing chat session and message functionalities.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: Root Angular component managing chat sessions and messages, theme setup, and rendering child components.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the theme CSS variables and starts chat session initialization.

methods.name: active
methods.description: Getter for the active chat session.

methods.name: loadingSessions
methods.description: Getter indicating if chat sessions are loading.

methods.name: loadingMessages
methods.description: Getter indicating if chat messages are loading.

methods.name: sending
methods.description: Getter indicating if a message is being sent.

methods.name: typing
methods.description: Getter indicating if the chat bot is typing.

methods.name: onSelectSession
methods.description: Handler to set the active chat session.

methods.name: onCreateSession
methods.description: Handler to create a new chat session.

methods.name: onRemoveSession
methods.description: Handler to delete a chat session.

methods.name: onSendMessage
methods.description: Handler to send a message in the current session.
